title: Mastrad Stainless Steel Granola Bars Set (10 Cavities Tray + 2 Pcs Cereals + Recipe Leaflet), PFOA-Free, Non-stick, Grey - F40860
features: MATERIAL: Made of premium quality stainless steel which assures that they wont fade, rust or corrode during its use. The included tamper comes with a tab to help you press your bars down into the cavities as well as unmould them easily after baking.

INCLUDES: Mastrad granola bars set comes with 10 cavities in a tray, perfect to prepare a delicious, healthy breakfast for the whole family. It is also possible to customize each cavity whichever you prefer. Recipe leaflet will guide you how to use it without any hesitation.
PFOA FREE: The premium quality metal pan has a nonstick coating and is PFOA free for added safety. Enjoy a healthy and fuss free cooking experience with our cereal bar set.

EASY TO CLEAN: The non stick coating assures that there would be no residue remaining in the tray enabling you a hassle free cleaning experience. When you are done, just clean the tray with water and its ready to use again.

CUSTOMER SATISFACTION: Satisfaction of customers is our primary concern. Made from premium quality material and gone through stringent quality tests, our product are built with style and made to last. Just click on the “Add to Cart” button and enjoy a risk-free purchase.
description: Mastrad Stainless Steel Granola Bars Set - Grey

Mastrad cereal bars makes health foods, raw or cooked with ease for the whole family. Providing you 100% non-stick PFOA free tray with 10 cavities which is very useful for large families. After using tray, you can easily wash with water. You can use this tray to make homemade brownies, mini cakes, chocolate bars, drizzle cakes, sponge cake, mini lasagna, financiers, flapjacks and much more. The included tamper comes with a tab to help you press your bars down into the cavities as well as unmould them easily after baking. It also proves to be a perfect gift for your loved ones during dinner parties or house warming. So now give your morning a lift and rock out with your perfectly baked and shaped granola bars.
-High-quality stainless steel -PFOA free -Large tray comes with 10 cavities -Non-Stick -Wash by using a simple sponge -2 years warranty
